reviewText:
The game is a regular platformer, it is not amazing, it is not bad, art is okay, gameplay is cool, the camera can get you a little dizzy. I am pretty sure the character has nothing to  do with El Chapo Guzman. You can play it with an Xbox controller, for a better experience.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BHqkY0GZKYY

Get it on sale. ( the game is 2$ as regular tho )

Pro:
+Not to hard
+Nice retro music
+Gameplay feels allright
++El Chapo

Con:
-Short
-Not to hard

reviewText:
Review written on Sunday, March 20th, 2016

Review  This Game is not just an expansion to Hot Guns, it’s also a Masterpiece itself. The graphics are kept in a high resolution retro version which is totally fine and makes this Game a must have for every retro fan. The Game itself is a platformer with a well-made full controller support (tested with Xbox 360 Controller). The character (a prisoner) moves smooth and I did not notice any bugs while playing. The difficulty of the level slowly increases in a fair and enjoyable way over the 30 levels you can play.
The goal of the Game itself is to escape from a prison which is split in 30 sections. You will find many different items which can help you to escape from the prison. For example Guns and Helmets. The Game principle itself is very simple but makes the Game super fun. Also if you think the Game is too easy for you, you may also try to get the hidden Keys in every level.
I totally recommend to buy this Game now (Since it has a -20%) because in my eyes the Game is worth far more than only $2.

Rating:
8.8/10

Pros:  Well-made Platformer
Enjoyable puzzles
Full Controller Support
A lot of different items
Works also on older devices
Well-chosen music retro music
Cons:  No achievements

reviewText:
Very Unique retro puzzle platformer
You are Jake trying to escape this prison full of different traps! You will encounter some electricity, blades, mines and dummy enemies running with exploding mines.

Pros

Fluid controls
Great Music
Awesome levels
Collectable key in evey level
Special kind of dummy enemies carrying mines
Random weapons
Bonus levels for collecting keys
Great looking menus
Cons

Same kind of level style can bored some people
Tricky at some points
Conclusion

Very good retro puzzle platformer with low cost!

Every platformer player need to check this game out


Hardware what I used

Hardware        Type                Model        Acer ICONIA 6120 Dual-Screen Touchbook 14                Controller        Xbox one Lunar White                OS        Windows 10 pro 64bit            CPU        Intel i5 M480 @ 2.67GHz            RAM        8GB DDR3             HDD        600gb HDD"
